subject: Express Shipping?
description_text:
Hello SIMSONN team,
I have ordered a pair of Plus X Pedals 9 days ago with express shipping for a whopping 30€, just to find out the pedals are still in Belgium. Please elaborate on this situation as this really is unacceptable.

Order: #SSN4168

Regards,
Alexander

conversations.body_text: Hi alexhahn03@icloud. com,       I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see your package has been delivered—did you receive it?

Hello,
Yes I received the package but later than what was promised. What did I spent 30€ for express shipping for?
________________________________
Hi alexhahn03@icloud. com,    We sincerely apologize for the delayed delivery. Please cancel the dispute, and we will refund the additional shipping charges.

I have canceled the dispute.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi alexhahn03@icloud. com,    Thank you for your understanding! We have refunded your extra shipping charges.
